import React from "react"; import Cards from "./Cards"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const Home = () => { const history = useHistory(); const [search, setSearch] = React.useState("") const handleSearchChange = (e) => { setSearch(e.target.value) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() history.push(`/movies/${search}`) } return ( <> <>
); }; export default Home;
